column4: Tesla's Elon Musk  SEC to face off in U.S. court on April 4
column5: NEW YORK Lawyers for Elon Musk and the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission will square off in a Manhattan courtroom next week over whether the Tesla Inc chief executive should be held in contempt over one of his tweets.

column4: Apple  Qualcomm gird for next phase of patent battle after mixed U.S. rulings
column5: Split decisions on Tuesday by a U.S. government panel in  acrimonious patent disputes between iPhone-maker Apple and chip supplier Qualcomm left their battle lines largely unchanged ahead of a U.S Federal Trade Commission ruling and a major trial next month.

column4: UPDATE 6-Apple  Qualcomm gird for next phase of patent battle after mixed U.S. rulings
column5: March 26 Split decisions on Tuesday by a U.S. government panel in  acrimonious patent disputes between iPhone-maker Apple and chip supplier Qualcomm left their battle lines largely unchanged ahead of a U.S Federal Trade Commission ruling and a major trial next month.
